usx.para: This book is the account about Jonah, when he disobeyed God, was three days in a big fish\'s belly, and finally went to warn the wicked people in Nineveh city that God was going to destroy them. We call this book JONAH.
Jonah thanks Yahweh for rescuing him
The people in Nineveh repented after Jonah warned them
Yahweh teaches Jonah that he has/shows mercy and compassion
